definition: simple/uncomplicated/letter/to choose/to select/bamboo strips used for writing (old)

sentences.english: "I think very differently, " answered Elizabeth, shortly;
sentences.chinese: “我卻大不以爲然，”伊麗莎白簡慢地答道。
我簡慢地駁回了這一抗議。

sentences.english: He answered my questions rather shortly.
sentences.chinese: 他相當簡慢地回答我的問題。

sentences.english: He was very short with me today.
sentences.chinese: 他今天對我很簡慢無禮。

sentences.english: He became increasingly offhand with Victoria.
sentences.chinese: 他對維多利亞變得越來越簡慢。
